title: MASSIVE 17000 MAN SIEGE: COMPETITVE BATTLE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
description:
MAN SIEGE BATTLE: COMPETITIVE BATTLE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay - Today we have a HUGE battle on Medieval Kingdoms. This is a 4v3 siege battle that is extremely competitive. It is very long, but goes by fast because there is non-stop action! Enjoy the Battle :D

Teams!
DEFENDERS - Sicily, County of Toulouse, and the Kingdom of Jerusalem 

Attackers - HRE, France, Portugal, and Teutonic Order

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
